tagline: Dream Slider is a image slider jQuery Plugin with interactive visual effects

![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg) >DreamSlider, a jQuery treat ============= *** Description ---------------- DreamSlider is a jQuery image slider plugin with great visual effects. Main Features ---------------- + Hover effects for thumbnails : Zoom-in(default),bounce,standout. + Single image/Gallery mode to create an image slideshow with thumbnails + Small file size,easy to implement. + No additional thumb images required. + Browser support: v47.0,Firefox v42.0,IE11+ & many more to come.
